titleInfo.title: $ 5 0 R E W A R D.

mods.abstract: $ 5 0 R E W A R D . RUNAWAY from the plantation of Virginie Parlange & Co., on False River, George, black ; William, a griff ; Jim, black ; Albert, black ; and Jacob, also black ; rangin from 18 to 25 years of age ; American negroes lately purchased from Virginia ; speaking only the English language. They are tall and robust. The above reward will be given to any person who will apprehend said negroes, and deliver them on the above plantation ; or ten dollars for each of them. V. PARLANGE & Co. False River, March 12, 2859

detail.title: Pointe Coupee Democrat. : (False River [i.e. New Roads], Parish of Pointe Coupee [La.]) 1858-1874
